name: Affiliate Links Manager
author: WinkPress

sections.description:
With this plugin you can:

  • Create simple URL redirects.
  • Track clicks in your Google Analytics account.
  • Reduce load on your server — this plugin handles redirects efficiently.

The plugin’s menu is under “Links” in the admin sidebar.

For more details and support visit the plugin’s page.

Developed by WinkPress.
sections.installation:
Upload and activate. That’s it.

But your site must be using pretty permalinks.

And to get click tracking, your site must be preconfigured with Google Analytics.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • A lot of people have been using the plugin and no problems reported, so it graduated to 1.0
  • Fixed a minor bug in ?goto= tracking

0.5.3

  • Fixed another in_array warning

0.5.2

  • Fixed the not-yet documented feature of ?goto=

0.5.1

  • Fixed some bugs
  • Made paths dynamic

0.5

  • Initial release

short_description: WordPress Affiliate Links Manager by WinkPress helps you create friendly affiliate redirects and track them in Google Analytics.
